Chiropractor serving Droitwich, Worcester and Bromsgrove communities

Holistic chiropractic care for your health.

You can count on Dr. Andrew's experience in using chiropractic to help you live a pain-free life.

Book Now

Back to your best self.

Living a healthy life means being pain free. It also means having the ability to fully participate in life. At Droitwich Chiropractic, we implement the Holistic Health Process helps you get out of pain and achieve long-term wellbeing. We have 2 goals for you:


  1. Get you feeling and moving better quickly
  2. Improve the function of your body so you can continue to do what you love.
Our Holistic Health Process

Conditions we can help with

Migraines

Shoulder Pain

Headaches

Our Holistic Health Process

Our focus at Droitwich Back and Neck Clinic is to help you overcome pain and physical limitations and get back to doing what you love.

Our Holistic Health Process is how we bridge the gap from where you currently are, to where you want to be. We do this in a caring, patient centered way that leaves you feeling empowered about your health.

Here is how our unique process works:

We Listen.

This is the most important part, we always ensure you feel heard and understood.Dr. Andrew will spend time with you to listen to your health concerns and your goals. This is the foundation we help you rebuild your health from.

Examination

Our comprehensive examination process includes neurological, orthopedic, and musculoskeletal tests designed to establish an accurate diagnosis.

Personalized Treatment

Once the doctor has established a diagnosis, he will tailor a treatment plan specific to your needs and your health goals.

Prevention

When your initial goals have been met, we may recommend periodic maintenance adjustments, specific rehabilitation exercises, or lifestyle changes to help prevent problems from returning.

Learn about the Holistic Health Process

Dr. Andrew Robson

Andrew initially qualified as a chiropractor because he wanted to help improve other people’s lives in the same way that a chiropractor had improved his. Several years of competitive rowing, including international events, had left him with regular back pain and discomfort.
